article_text:
The official weigh-in for Ultimate Fighting Championship’s UFC 191 takes place at 5 p.m. Friday in Las Vegas.

UFC is broadcasting the full event live via YouTube.

The card is headlined with champion Demetrious Johnson taking on John Dodson for the UFC flyweight title.

The main card will be broadcast at 8 p.m. Saturday on pay-per-view. The prelim card is on Fox Sports 1 starting at 6 p.m.

article_summary:
The official weigh-in for Ultimate Fighting Championship’s UFC 191 takes place at 5 p.m. Friday in Las Vegas.
The card is headlined with champion Demetrious Johnson taking on John Dodson for the UFC flyweight title.
The prelim card is on Fox Sports 1 starting at 6 p.m.
UFC is broadcasting the full event live via YouTube.
The main card will be broadcast at 8 p.m. Saturday on pay-per-view.
